Html: Hello, sorry if this has been asked before but I am having trouble figuring out how to use the abbreviated title of a journal in AMA format.  For example instead of "Social Science and Medicine" I want to say "Soc Sci Med" or World Development to say "Word Dev".  I am looking for a format that allows you to list the abbreviated title in a different field, not "journal name", so that it is easy to switch the formats between those that require abbreviated titles and those that do not. Thanks.
